sense.gloss: changing room (at a bathhouse, swimming pool, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑脱衣↑↓|だつい↓↑場↑↓じょ|う↓は↑滑↑↓すべ↓りやすいので、↑注意↑↓ちゅうい↓しましょう。
sdata.e: It's slippery in the undressing area, so be careful.
